From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The hum of the energy in Megatron's cannon began to die down. "What, how
do you know of the great war. Unless..." Megatron lowered his cannon,
and began to ponder something that had happened, millions of years ago. 

Wildrider began to back away, seeing that there was going to be no more
action. Beastbox followed him. They headed to the Computer room, to find
Motormaster already there. He looked furious. "What is it fearless
leader" Wildrider said, sarcasm dripping off of his statement.
"Somebodies been messing with our computer" Motormaster said, not
interested in Wildrider's insolence. Just then the computer picked up a
message, and the images blew wide open. Appearing in front of
Motormaster was the familiar room in which they had been briefed before
sent to earth. The same three Predacons, the Tripredicus Council,
dominating the screen, six other figueres in the backround.
Motormaster's jaw hung in surprise.
